mapper.sql: id, country, country_id, area, area_id, region, region_id, city, city_id, county, county_id, isp, isp_id, ip, uri, `location`, create_date AS createDate, create_by AS createBy, update_date AS updateDate, update_by AS updateBy, del_flag AS delFlag, ip_record_id AS ipRecordId
mapper.select: select * from sys_ip_data i where i.ip=#{0} and i.del_flag=0
